string-array.name: splash_quotes
string-array.item: \"Technology is a good servant but a dangerous master. We should use machines and love people.\"
\"Let us colour our lips with words of truth. Let us trace our eyes with lines of compassion.\"
\"A flower has such a short life span, and yet it offers itself wholeheartedly to others.\"
\"The Cosmic power inside each one of us is God.\"
\"When thoughts decrease we begin to understand our oneness with the entire universe.\"
\"Where there is true love, the attitude of sacrifice comes automatically.\"
\"We should gain control over our mind as we do to a TV using the remote control.\"
\"May all beings be happy and free. May the thoughts, words, and actions of my life contribute in some way to that happiness and to that freedom for all.\”
\"The art of relaxation brings out the power that exists within you; through relaxation you can experience your infinite capabilities.\"
\"Just as a toddler falls before he or she learns to walk with firm steps, our own failures are the beginning of the ascent towards the ultimate victory.\"
\"God is standing at the door of your heart. Call Him. He is waiting to come in.\"
\"Let us try to reach a state in which we are able to see all beings on earth as part of our own Self.\"
\"A seed has to go down in the soil for its potential form as a plant to emerge. Only through modesty and humility can we grow.\"
\“Laughter is the music of the soul.\”
\"The tears of true devotion are more powerful than meditation.\"
\"Contentment and happiness depend solely on the mind. Both heaven and hell are created by the mind.\"
\"Life should be like wholehearted, natural laughter. This is spirituality, this is real prayer.\"
\"Let prayer and remembrance of God become part of your daily life.\"
\"When the present is so beautiful and full, why worry about the future? Let the future unfold by itself from the present.\"
\"We call and God responds. The nature of the response depends on the call.\"
\"Even if you lose a million dollars it can be recovered. But if you lose a second you can never get it back.\"
\"Feeling life’s oneness broadens our minds, expands our hearts and spreads love to all of creation.\"
\"My children, to develop selfless love is the greatest progress we can make.\"
\"Love is not complex. It is our essential nature: simple and spontaneous.\"
\"If you have true faith, then automatically you will ‘fall’ from the head into the heart.\"
\"The opportunity to love and serve others should be considered a rare gift, a blessing from God.\"
\"Pray: O Lord, both in happiness and in sorrow, grant me the boon to remember You without fail.\"
\"Whatever is associated with the mind is bound to change. The Truth is that which is changeless. It is the Self.\"
\"Pick just one quality/virtue and follow it with utmost faith and optimism; other qualities will follow automatically.\"
\"If we keep holding on to God, there is nothing to fear.\"
\"A contemplative and meditative life gives us the capacity to go deeper into the various experiences of life.\"
\"Our attitude should be: Whatever happens I will remain strong, courageous and happy.\"
\"If we sincerely look into the mirror of our conscience, we won\'t have much problem overcoming our weaknesses and limitations.\"
\"Open your heart and pray: May all beings in the universe attain peace and happiness.\"
\"Nature is God made visible.\"
\"Through living a good life we can rewrite our destiny.\"
\"The real source of grace is within you.\"
\"First, the human mind should be harmonized, then harmony of Nature will spontaneously take place.\"
\"It is not what we receive but what we are able to give that determines the value of our life.\"
\"Mother Earth is serving us. The sun, the moon and the stars all serve us. What can we do in return for their selfless service?\"
\"Earth is our mother; nature is our mother. We should not forget our duty towards them.\"
\"Nature can take back what She has given to use. If we understand this, we will be humble towards nature.\"
\"We are the light of the Divine, and bliss is our birthright. We are the eternally free, infinite Atman.\"
\"Life is filled with God’s light, but only through optimism will you experience that light.\"
\"There is a child within everyone. The innocence and playfulness of a child exists in all human beings.\"
\"The transformation of our limited love into Divine Love is the goal of spirituality."\"
\"Spirituality is the science that teaches us how to live happily in the material world.\"
\"Everything is God, there is nothing else but God.\"
\"Pure, innocent love makes everything possible.\"
\"We will never find fulfillment unless we direct our energy towards the supreme goal of life.\"
\"Every situation created by the master is a gift of grace, meant to remove the ego.\"
\"Grow without allowing your innocence to fade away.\"
\"To succeed in spiritual life persistent enthusiasm and sustained efforts are needed.\"
\"Take a vow for a life of service to others.\"
\"All our actions should be done with the attitude that this moment alone is ours; the next moment is not in our hands.\"
\"Try to spend at least a little time thinking about what you could do for others today.\"
\"While carrying responsibilities never forget to smile.\"
\"There are no mistakes in God’s creation. every creature and every object that has been created by God is so utterly special.\"
\"Enjoy the beauty of nature with the awareness that this is all an expression of the Divine.\"
\"When we live harmoniously with nature in love and unity, we will have the strength to overcome any crisis.\"
\"Humanity is dependent on nature for its very existence. In truth, we are not protecting nature; it is nature who protects us.\"
\"Nature sacrifices herself for humans whereas we not only exploit her, but destroy her. Yet nature serves us.\"
\"Mother earth is serving us; the sun, the moon and the stars all serve us. What can we do in return for their selfless service?\"
\"Look at the beauty of nature. Living harmoniously with nature will in itself bring happiness and contentment.\"
\"Only through love and respect of nature will we become spiritually awakened. Our goal is to feel life everywhere.\"
\"When you bow down before all of existence, in utter humility, the universe bows down to you and serves you.\"
\"Always remember that when dusk arrives, it already has dawn in its womb.\"
\"Making the mind one-pointed is the essence of all spiritual disciplines. One of the best methods for this is meditation.\"
\"Meditation is the technique that allows you to shut the doors and windows of the senses, so that you can look within and see your True Self.\"
\"Our mind becomes impure by the many different thoughts that constantly arise. Meditation directs all those thoughts toward one point of focus.\"
\"Darling children, always remember in your heart that God is Love. By meditating on the embodiment of Love, you yourselves will become this Love.\"
\"Meditation helps us to see everything as a delightful play so that even the moment of death becomes a blissful experience.\"
\"Crying for God for five minutes is equal to one hour of meditation.\"
\"In meditation you become silent, and remain at rest in your own True Self.\"
\"Smiling is one of the highest forms of meditation.\"
\"You can change or transform your fate through the self-effort of meditation and sincere prayer.\"
\"Even when you meditate on the name or form of a God, Goddess or Amma, you are, in fact, meditating on your own Self; not on some external object.\"
\"Meditation and other spiritual practices give us the power and courage to smile at death.\"
\"Meditate with the conviction that your beloved Deity resides in your own heart.\"
\"My children, never fail to practice your daily routine. No matter how tired or sick you are, you should try to sit and meditate for some time.\"
\"Genuine prayer is meditation. It is communion with God that takes place in the quiet stillness of our heart.\"
\"Those who pray to God and meditate on God sincerely will not experience a shortage of anything essential.\"
\"It is good to meditate in dim light. External light can be a disturbance when we are trying to illuminate our interior.\"
\"Love and beauty are within you. Try to express them through your actions, and you will definitely touch the very source of bliss.\"
\"The powers of unshakable faith and innocent love can penetrate into realms where intellect and logic cannot enter.\"
\"The intellect and the heart should come together as one; then Divine grace will flow into us and bestow contentment in our lives.\"
\"One who is able to love everyone equally is the one who truly loves Amma.\"
\"The love that you experience is proportional to the love that you give.\"
\"Untainted, selfless and pure love is the bridge towards God.\"
\"Spirituality has nothing to do with blind faith; it is the principle of awareness that dispels darkness.\"
\"Real faith is faith in one’s own self. Even if we believe in an external God, in actuality this God is inside of us; it is our own true self.\"
\"Whatever religion we follow, as long as we understand spiritual principles, we can attain the ultimate goal: the realization of one’s true nature.\"
\"The real meaning of religion is to have faith in the existence of a supreme Power and to live according to spiritual values.\"
\"Love and compassion are the underlying principles of all genuine religions. These Divine qualities are the essence of all faiths.\"
\"If you have true faith, then you will automatically fall into the heart. To fall into the heart is actually rising up and soaring high.\"
\"All of life rests in faith. For each step forward we need faith. Faith creates a flow, which inundates the entire universe.\"
\"Focus on love, mutual trust and faith. When you have love and faith, alertness in all of your actions will automatically follow.\"
\"Without faith, we are full of fear. Fear cripples the body and mind, paralyzing us, whereas faith opens our hearts and leads us to love.\"
\"Mother does not say that you need to believe in Her or in God. It is enough to believe in yourself. Everything is within you.\"
\"Faith is not an intellectual process. The Master cannot be understood through the mind or intellect. Faith alone is the way.\"
\"If one has faith and obedience to the guru coupled with knowledge of spiritual principles, vasanas will be quickly destroyed.\"
\"For a sincere seeker, spirituality is not a minor aspect of life; it is as much a part of you as your own breath. Your faith becomes unshakable.\"
\"If you pray to mother with innocence and faith, she will definitely help you. She is always there for you. If you fall down, she will help you up.\"
\"With the faith and trust of a child, anything is possible. Your innocence and pure heart will save you.\"
\"We should develop faith in ourselves instead of leaning on others for solace. Only then will we find true comfort and satisfaction.\"
\"Receptivity is the power to believe, to have faith and to accept love. It is the power to prevent doubt from entering your mind.\"
\"Move forward with faith. One who has unconditional faith will never swerve from the path.\"
\"Have faith, my children. There is no need to be afraid. Know that Mother is always with you.\"
\"Whenever you feel inspired and have the time, sit in solitude and try to visualise everything as pure light and bliss consciousness.\"
\"Even if all the people in the world were to love us, even then, we would not get an infinitesimal amount of the bliss that we get from God’s love.\"
\"When you become sugar, then there is nothing but sweetness. Likewise, when we are in a state of true witnessing, there is only bliss.\"
\"Children, when innocence awakens in our heart, allowing us to see everything in its light, there is only bliss.\"
\"Only someone who has assimilated spiritual principles can confidently face the challenging situations of life without breaking down.\"
\"Attaching oneself to the transient nature of the world is the cause of all sorrows and sufferings.\"
\"Pray for a heart that rejoices in the happiness of others and empathizes in their sorrow.\"
\"Everything happens spontaneously when you distance yourself from your mind.\"
\"The entire creation hugs Amma. In Reality Amma and creation are in an eternal embrace.\"
\"Our ultimate dharma is Self-realization. Thoughts and actions that support our spiritual evolution are real dharma.\"
\"Only when human beings are able to perceive and acknowledge the Self in each other can there be real peace.\"
\"If we are able to develop the right attitude, we can drastically reduce the burden of our sorrows.\"
\"A true relationship is possible only when one is able to let go of all one\'s preconceived ideas and prejudices, and when one stops being possessed by the past.\"
\"Gratitude is an inner connection with us, God and the entire universe.\"
